original_text: She looked, and there was the king, standing by his pillar at the entrance. The officers and the trumpeters were beside the king, and all the people of the land were rejoicing and blowing trumpets, and musicians with their instruments were leading the praises. Then Athaliah tore her robes and shouted, “Treason! Treason!”
korean_text: 보매 왕이 성전 문 기둥 곁에 섰고 지휘관들과 나팔수들이 왕의 곁에 모셔 서 있으며 그 땅의 모든 백성들이 즐거워하여 나팔을 불며 노래하는 자들은 주악하며 찬송을 인도하는지라 이에 아달랴가 그의 옷을 찢으며 외치되 반역이로다 반역이로다 하매

sentences.original_text: standing by his pillar at the entrance
sentences.korean_translation: 입구에서 그의 기둥 옆에 서 있었다

sentences.original_text: The officers and the trumpeters were beside the king
sentences.korean_translation: 관원들과 나팔 부는 자들이 왕의 곁에 있었고

sentences.original_text: and all the people of the land were rejoicing
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 땅의 모든 백성들이 기뻐하고 있었다

sentences.original_text: and musicians with their instruments were leading the praises
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 악기 가진 음악가들이 찬송을 이끌고 있었다
